languages.text: {n}Абеляр мгновение хмурится и молчит, потом продолжает:{/n} "Мы служили Лорд-капитану Теодоре долгие годы и никогда не ладили. Он был... дерзким. Не боялся брать на себя ответственность, добровольно брался за сложные задания. Тяжело признавать, но... плодами его трудов протекторат фон Валанциус продолжает пользоваться и по сей день. Его служба всегда вызывала у меня уважение. Все остальное вызывало желание свернуть шею этой двуличной змее".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр мгновение хмурится и молчит, потом продолжает:{/n} "Мы служили Лорду-Капитану Теодоре долгие годы и никогда не ладили. Он был... дерзким. Не боялся брать на себя ответственность, добровольно брался за сложные задания. Тяжело признавать, но... плодами его трудов империя фон Валанциус продолжает пользоваться и по сей день. Его служба всегда вызывала у меня уважение. Все остальное вызывало желание свернуть шею этой двуличной змее".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard frowns for a moment, then continues,{/n} "We both served Lord Captain Theodora for many years and we never saw eye to eye. He was... brash. He was never afraid of assuming responsibility, and he willingly took on difficult tasks. I am loath to admit it, but... the von Valancius protectorate continues to reap the fruits of his labours to this day. His service always garnered my respect. But everything else about him made me want to wring the neck of that two-faced snake."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр мгновение хмурится и молчит, потом продолжает:{/n} "Мы служили Лорд-капитану Теодоре долгие годы и никогда не ладили. Он был... дерзким. Не боялся брать на себя ответственность, добровольно брался за сложные задания. Тяжело признавать, но... плодами его трудов протекторат фон Валанциус продолжает пользоваться и по сей день. Его служба всегда вызывала у меня уважение. Все остальное вызывало желание свернуть шею этой двуличной змее".

But everything else about him made me want to wring the neck of that two-faced snake."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德皱了一会儿眉头，随后继续说道。{/n}“我们两个都侍奉过西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯领主舰长许多年，但我们从来都没看对眼过。他是个……强悍的家伙。他从来不惧怕承担责任，而且愿意主动承担困难的任务。虽然我并不愿意承认这点，但……冯·瓦兰修斯王朝至今仍然在享受他的劳动成果。他过去的工作成果总是能赢得我的尊重，但至于其他的一切，我只想把那条两面三刀的毒蛇脖子拧断。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns for a moment, then continues,{/n} "We both served Lord Captain Theodora for many years and we never saw eye to eye. He was... brash. He was never afraid of assuming responsibility, and he willingly took on difficult tasks. I am loath to admit it, but... the von Valancius protectorate continues to reap the fruits of his labours to this day. His service always garnered my respect. But everything else about him made me want to wring the neck of that two-faced snake."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德皱了一会儿眉头，随后继续说道。{/n}“我们两个都侍奉过西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯领主舰长许多年，但我们从来都没看对眼过。他是个……强悍的家伙。他从来不惧怕承担责任，而且愿意主动承担困难的任务。虽然我并不愿意承认这点，但……冯·瓦兰修斯王朝至今仍然在享受他的劳动成果。他过去的工作成果总是能赢得我的尊重，但至于其他的一切，我只想把那条两面三刀的毒蛇脖子拧断。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns for a moment, then continues,{/n} "We both served Lord Captain Theodora for many years and we never saw eye to eye. He was... brash. He was never afraid of assuming responsibility, and he willingly took on difficult tasks. I am loath to admit it, but... the von Valancius protectorate continues to reap the fruits of his labours to this day. His service always garnered my respect. But everything else about him made me want to wring the neck of that two-faced snake."

languages.text: {n}Abelard frunce el ceño antes de continuar:{/n} «Los dos servimos a la Lord Capitán Theodora durante muchos años y nunca estuvimos de acuerdo. Era... un temerario. Nunca tenía miedo de responsabilizarse de algo y aceptaba voluntariamente las tareas más peligrosas. Por mucho que odie admitirlo... el protectorado von Valancius sigue beneficiándose de su trabajo a día de hoy. Su servicio siempre le hizo ganarse mi respeto, pero todo lo demás relacionado con él hacía que quisiera retorcerle el pescuezo a esa víbora traicionera».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns for a moment, then continues,{/n} "We both served Lord Captain Theodora for many years and we never saw eye to eye. He was... brash. He was never afraid of assuming responsibility, and he willingly took on difficult tasks. I am loath to admit it, but... the von Valancius protectorate continues to reap the fruits of his labours to this day. His service always garnered my respect. But everything else about him made me want to wring the neck of that two-faced snake."

Nunca tenía miedo de responsabilizarse de algo y aceptaba voluntariamente las tareas más peligrosas. Por mucho que odie admitirlo... el protectorado von Valancius sigue beneficiándose de su trabajo a día de hoy. Su servicio siempre le hizo ganarse mi respeto, pero todo lo demás relacionado con él hacía que quisiera retorcerle el pescuezo a esa víbora traicionera».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはしばらく顔をしかめた後、こう続けた。{/n}「私たちは何年もロード・キャプテン・シオドーラに仕えていましたが、決して意見が一致することはありませんでした。彼は…厚かましい男でした。責任を負うことを恐れず、困難な仕事も進んで引き受けてきました。認めたくないことですが…フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領は、今日まで彼の労苦の成果を享受し続けています。その奉仕は私とて常に感服するところでありました。しかし、彼に関する他のすべてのことは、あの二枚舌の蛇の首を絞めたくなるようなものでもありました」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns for a moment, then continues,{/n} "We both served Lord Captain Theodora for many years and we never saw eye to eye. He was... brash. He was never afraid of assuming responsibility, and he willingly took on difficult tasks. I am loath to admit it, but... the von Valancius protectorate continues to reap the fruits of his labours to this day. His service always garnered my respect. But everything else about him made me want to wring the neck of that two-faced snake."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはしばらく顔をしかめた後、こう続けた。{/n}「私たちは何年もロード・キャプテン・シオドーラに仕えていましたが、決して意見が一致することはありませんでした。彼は…厚かましい男でした。責任を負うことを恐れず、困難な仕事も進んで引き受けてきました。認めたくないことですが…フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領は、今日まで彼の労苦の成果を享受し続けています。その奉仕は私とて常に感服するところでありました。しかし、彼に関する他のすべてのことは、あの二枚舌の蛇の首を絞めたくなるようなものでもありました」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard runzelt einen Augenblick lang die Stirn, dann fährt er fort: {/n} "Wir haben viele Jahre lang Lord Captain Theodora gedient, und wir waren nie einer Meinung. Er war ... schroff. Er ist nie davor zurückgeschreckt, Verantwortung zu übernehmen, und er hat willentlich schwierige Aufgaben übernommen. Ich gebe es ungern zu, doch ... das Protektorat von Valancius erntet noch heute die Früchte seiner Arbeit. Sein Dienst hat mir immer Respekt abgerungen. Doch alles andere an ihm weckte in mir den Wunsch, dieser doppelzüngigen Schlange den Hals umzudrehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns for a moment, then continues,{/n} "We both served Lord Captain Theodora for many years and we never saw eye to eye. He was... brash. He was never afraid of assuming responsibility, and he willingly took on difficult tasks. I am loath to admit it, but... the von Valancius protectorate continues to reap the fruits of his labours to this day. His service always garnered my respect. But everything else about him made me want to wring the neck of that two-faced snake."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard runzelt einen Augenblick lang die Stirn, dann fährt er fort: {/n} "Wir haben viele Jahre lang Lord Captain Theodora gedient, und wir waren nie einer Meinung. Er war ... schroff. Er ist nie davor zurückgeschreckt, Verantwortung zu übernehmen, und er hat willentlich schwierige Aufgaben übernommen. Ich gebe es ungern zu, doch ... das Protektorat von Valancius erntet noch heute die Früchte seiner Arbeit. Sein Dienst hat mir immer Respekt abgerungen. Doch alles andere an ihm weckte in mir den Wunsch, dieser doppelzüngigen Schlange den Hals umzudrehen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard poursuit en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} « Pendant toutes nos années au service de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora, nous ne nous sommes jamais entendus. Il était... impétueux. Il n'avait jamais peur d'assumer ses responsabilités et se portait volontaire pour les missions les plus difficiles. Il me coûte de l'admettre, mais... le protectorat von Valancius continue à récolter les fruits de son labeur encore aujourd'hui. L'efficacité avec laquelle il accomplissait son devoir m'a toujours inspiré du respect, mais tous les autres aspects de ce serpent perfide me donnaient envie de lui tordre le cou. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns for a moment, then continues,{/n} "We both served Lord Captain Theodora for many years and we never saw eye to eye. He was... brash. He was never afraid of assuming responsibility, and he willingly took on difficult tasks. I am loath to admit it, but... the von Valancius protectorate continues to reap the fruits of his labours to this day. His service always garnered my respect. But everything else about him made me want to wring the neck of that two-faced snake."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard poursuit en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} « Pendant toutes nos années au service de la seigneure-capitaine Théodora, nous ne nous sommes jamais entendus. Il était... impétueux. Il n'avait jamais peur d'assumer ses responsabilités et se portait volontaire pour les missions les plus difficiles. Il me coûte de l'admettre, mais... le protectorat von Valancius continue à récolter les fruits de son labeur encore aujourd'hui. L'efficacité avec laquelle il accomplissait son devoir m'a toujours inspiré du respect, mais tous les autres aspects de ce serpent perfide me donnaient envie de lui tordre le cou. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, bir an için kaşlarını çatıp devam ediyor:{/n} "Yıllarca Lord Kaptan Theodora'ya hizmet ettik ama hiç anlaşamadık. Kendisi... Ukalaydı. Sorumluluk almaktan hiç kaçınmaz, zor işlere şevkle girişirdi. Kabullenmekten iğrensem de... Von Valancius protektorası, çabalarının faydasını hâlen görmekte. Kunrad'ın hizmetine hep saygı duydum. Fakat diğer yönlerinden ötürü o ikiyüzlü yılanı boğazlayasım gelirdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard frowns for a moment, then continues,{/n} "We both served Lord Captain Theodora for many years and we never saw eye to eye. He was... brash. He was never afraid of assuming responsibility, and he willingly took on difficult tasks. I am loath to admit it, but... the von Valancius protectorate continues to reap the fruits of his labours to this day. His service always garnered my respect. But everything else about him made me want to wring the neck of that two-faced snake."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard bir an için kaşlarını çatıp devam ediyor:{/n} "Yıllarca Lord Kaptan Theodora'ya hizmet ettik ama hiç anlaşamadık. Kendisi... Ukalaydı. Sorumluluk almaktan hiç kaçınmaz, zor işlere şevkle girişirdi. Kabullenmekten iğrensem de... Von Valancius protektorası, çabalarının faydasını hâlen görmekte. Kunrad'ın hizmetine hep saygı duydum. Fakat diğer yönlerinden ötürü o ikiyüzlü yılanı boğazlamak istedim."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
